message.content:
1. An endpoint measurement was taken for supine systolic BP.
2. 4.9% of droxidopa recipients had a supine systolic BP >180 mm Hg at endpoint.
3. 2.5% of placebo recipients had a supine systolic BP >180 mm Hg at endpoint.
4. The measurement was comparing droxidopa recipients to placebo recipients.

messages.content:
Statement: At endpoint, supine systolic BP >180 mm Hg was observed in 4.9% of droxidopa and 2.5% of placebo recipients.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
